awards.recipient_name_raw: THE CHIPPEWA CREE TRIBE OF THE ROCKY BOY RESERVATION
awards.description: THIS AGREEMENT WILL PROVIDE ASSISTANCE TO THE CHIPPEWA CREE TRIBE IN ITS EFFORTS TO DEVELOP SPECIAL PURPOSE AIR QUALITY ACTIVITIES ON THE ROCKY BOY'S RESERVATION, INCLUDING CONTINUING DEVELOPMENT OF AIR QUALITY PROGRAMS; IMPROVEMENT OF EMISSION INVENTORIES FOR IDENTIFICATION OF POLLUTION SOURCES; AND TO DEVELOP AN AIR MONITORING NETWORK THAT COLLECTS AIR DATA. THESE ACTIVITIES ARE TO IMPROVE AND MAINTAIN THE PUBLIC'S AIR QUALITY.
